name: Beside Each Other - Demo
description:
It's only a Demo for now.

Live through the days of Daniel, a 17 year old high school student attending a new School. 

Despite his common nature, he hides a deep scar over his heart, which compromised his bonds with 3 childhood friends.

However, at destinies's allure, they are suddenly reunited years after!

Angelica, Daniel's younger sister, with a sharp tongue and the heart of a boy.

Lara, his hearing impaired childhood friend, with a fertile imagination and pure feelings.

Luca, a boy with a gentle heart, but an untamed wish.

What will this unpredictable encounter may unfold in their lives...?
